name: The Orb of the Elements
data: It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It has poor armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
Orb of the Elements might modify the user's intelligence.
Orb of the Elements might modify the user's spell point regeneration.
Orb of the Elements might modify the user's resistances.
Orb of the Elements might modify the user's spells.
You could probably <tune> the orb to a certain damage type, adding
some small skill in that damage, but you would probably sacrifice
much of the orb's power in doing so.
After you <tune>'d the orb, you could probably <untune> it.
